snippet.title: VIRTUA FIGHTER 5 R.E.V.O. - Opening Cinematic
snippet.description:
The legendary fighting series makes its Steam debut with Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.
Launching on Steam this winter!
Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3112260/Virtua_Fighter_5_REVO/

Step into the ring with Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. Based on Virtua Fighter 5 Ultimate Showdown, Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. gives players an optimized gaming experience in their quest to become the world’s greatest fighter. 

Features:
• Rollback Netcode
• Up to 60fps/4K support
• Gameplay balance adjustments and more

More details on Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. will be shared in the future. For more information on all SEGA games, please visit the official SEGA website at www.SEGA.com. 
X -    / sega   Facebook -    / sega   Instagram -    / sega   TikTok -    / sega_west
